meanings.definition: A practice game or informal game of football
meanings.sent1: During the scrimmage, the players practiced their football skills.
meanings.sent2: The team had a scrimmage to prepare for the upcoming match.
meanings.sent3: The scrimmage turned into a fun game of football among friends.
meanings.sent4: The scrimmage was like a mini football match before the real game.
meanings.sent5: The coach organized a scrimmage to help the players improve their game.

meanings.definition: A rough or confused struggle or fight
meanings.sent1: The two kids got into a scrimmage over a toy.
meanings.sent2: There was a scrimmage between the rival gangs in the alley.
meanings.sent3: The siblings' argument turned into a playful scrimmage.
meanings.sent4: The political debate turned into a heated scrimmage of words.
meanings.sent5: The scrimmage for the last piece of cake got intense.
